0 Param data.1 string m_text: What's that voice?
Who knows. Whatever it is, I hear it a lot lately.
Seriously, what's up with that noise?
It's sort of scaring me.
Kagachi, the Watchers have been summoned. We need to hurry to the Dais of Life.
Understood.
Yo, Kagachi.
Not only late, but with a woman in tow? You're one wicked boy, SLEAZEBALL.
Aww, how cold. Ya broke my little heart. I think I might just CRY. Waaah.
Give that tongue of yours a rest, Zale. It's giving me a headache.
Shush. It's starting.
Everyone here?
Okay. I'll get straight to the point.
Jigari's dead.
He was a great man, loved by all of us. Many of you owe him a great deal too, I'm sure.
He was a model for us all: the ideal Watcher.
But he didn't just die. He died with regrets. Hasn't moved an inch since he passed.
Kagachi, Mayura. I want you to go with Hitoha. Everyone else, stay here and devote yourself to prayer.
Dismissed.
Sorry, but I can handle this myself. I don't need you tagging along.
But...
Family, lover, or friend, your duty to the fallen is the same. See them off with a smile.
Father...
Forget what she said. Go. They're in Kiro Marsh.
Watch yourself out there.
And Kagachi? Take care of Hitoha.
What's the problem?
Sorry, I was just thinking about Hitoha.
Stay alert, or die horribly.
I know! But...I have a bad feeling about all this.
Specifically?
It's...nothing. Forget I said anything.
No... Not yet...
I... I don't want to die. There's...still so much I wanted to do. *sob*
I know. Shush, I know.
But you can't think that way. You mustn't.
But... But... *sob*
Ah, it's you two.
So you came after all. Thank you.
I'm sure he'll be fine. He just needs time.
We understand, and we're in no rush. Take as long as you need.
Thank you.
I...have a request for both of you.
What is it?
There're a few Lost not far from here. Could you take care of them for me?
I...don't want to leave him.
Of course. We'll handle it.
Thank you.
No one's here.
Where are these Lost? There's not a soul in sight.
She was buying time. We're going back.
Out of our way! Hitoha is going to get away!
We'll lose her if we both waste time here. Go. I'll catch up when I'm done.
Okay!
So she ran.
Phew, that's a relief.
I was afraid we'd get back here to find her dead.
Still, this is worse than we thought.
I've never heard of the living running off to elope with the dead.
Let's follow her trail. She can't have gone far.
Agreed. I hope we can catch her before this gets out of hand.
Hitoha!
Ah. I thought you might follow me.
Why? Why are you doing this!?
It's all my fault.
Kagachi, Mayura... I'm so sorry for all of this.
You should be.
Hitoha...
What were you planning to do if we didn't show up?
Heh heh...
*shrug* What indeed?
I don't quite know myself.
Hitoha... Let's send him off together.
I...can't do that.
You...what?
I've decided. I won't go back. I swore to be with him, in life...and in death.
Enough, Hitoha!
Jigari won't be able to pass if you keep talking like that!
Relax. I'll stay by his side.
So, I beg you—
No!
Please.
No! I won't do it!
Please! I've made my decision! I won't—I CAN'T go back!
I'll do it.
No! Don't, Kagachi!
It's not too late—if we act now.
Sorry. I'm being selfish, I know.
Unthinkable for a Watcher, huh?
Wait, no...
It's because I'm a Watcher that I can't believe we'll find each other in the next life.
That's why I want to see this through now, while we still share a bond.
I don't want to die because I believe we'll be together in the next life. I want to die because I can't live without him in this one.
I'm sorry.
But I have no regrets.
Live your lives as you see fit, and confront the truth with your own eyes.
Why?
Why did you do it?
Wouldn't prayers for the dead have been enough?
Our lives are built on the bonds we form with each other. These bonds are not so fragile that they can be broken by prayer alone.
You must have forgotten this when you lost your humanity.
As I'm sure you know, far fewer children are born in our lands than in times now past.
Reincarnation is the very cornerstone of our society. That makes this issue one of the gravest import.
It's conceivable a malicious cult is promoting a false ideology that runs counter to our basic precepts—just like the Ark did.
Consequently, we can expect to see a crackdown on those voicing heretical ideas.
It is vital that we do our utmost to reassure the people and support the sovereign.
Keep this foremost in your mind at all times.
Ugggh... What a pain in the ASS.
I've gotta go to Lake Lud ALONE. What a CHORE.
Can't I get outta this?
*sigh*
The realm and its people are groaning under the weight of our ideals.
Father! People can hear you!
Keep your voice down, you two!
Don't get me wrong. I'm not speaking out against the precepts.
I just think it's foolish to expect people to be grateful for death when we have no idea what happens once you pass through the Veil.
Sometimes, it all just feels so pointless, so cold.
It's a lot to ask of people just doing their best to live the lives they got.
You three. I wish to speak with you.
I have a task for you. I want you to apprehend the Butcher.
The Butcher?
A brutal killer, already linked to three deaths. No connection between the victims, besides location. The killer seems good with a sword.
I want you three to split up and sweep the backstreets. Keep an eye out for the Lost—some of his victims may still be lurking around.
So, first things first: look for the Lost.
Mayura and I will check around the palace.
Kagachi, you search the area around the gate.
Oh! Hey, Kagachi!
Leo just spoke with you guys, right? You, Kushi...and, uh, Mayura.
So, uh... What did you talk about?
Do you have time to be sticking your nose in other people's business?
Ahaha!
As prickly as always, I see! Classic Kagachi, hah! Am I right?
Looks like I've ruffled your feathers, so I'm out before you squawk at me.
You there. Were you murdered?
Yes... It was here. So sudden... From behind.
So you didn't see the killer's face.
I'm sorry, but no.
No need to apologize. I promise you, I'll catch the killer and send you off.
Oh, there's no need.
I don't harbor any hatred toward my killer.
Then why remain?
I planned on dying anyway. But without my charm, I'm too scared to go.
What charm?
It's supposed to help me find my soulmate in the next life.
Hmph. This again.
Nothing. Continue.
The peddler was out, so I ordered one special. It finally arrived, and I was on my way to pick it up when...
You were murdered.
Very well. I'll go fetch this trinket for you.
Thank you! Thank you so much!
Where's this peddler?
You'll find her on a street near the palace.
She died, but she seemed so content. How peculiar.
Don't you think so, Kagachi?
No.
Do you believe? In reincarnation, I mean.
My beliefs are my own. I see no reason to share them with you.
Meanie.
Kagachi, buying a charm? This really is the end of days.
What do you take me for?
This charm is to help send one of the Lost. She ordered one from this shop.
Wait... Was she one of the Butcher's victims too?
That's right.
We're here for the same reason. Looks like our victims had something in common after all.
Welcome, good cus—er...*gulp*
Your customers are dying. Care to explain why?
Wait, wait, wait!
Why should I know anything about it? It's absurd!
So you deny being the killer.
What reason would I have to kill them?
Please, this isn't funny! You'll put me out of business!
Hmph. I don't think she's lying.
In that case, we need your cooperation.
Have you seen anyone suspicious recently?
Particularly someone wearing a sword.
I have.
YOU GUYS!
You dare—!
Relax! Everybody relax!
Well, do you blame me!? You're a suspicious lot if ever there was one!
Day after day, lurking around my shop in that get-up, terrifying customers and driving off business!
Sorry, ma'am. The look sort of comes with the job.
It couldn't be...
If it was someone above suspicion... Could the killer be a Watcher?
That's ridiculous.
You. There's a Watcher who comes by here regularly, right? What does he look like?
Hmm... Let's see. I only got a brief glance at him, but...
How do I describe it? He seemed kind of cocky, perhaps? Maybe a bit of a deadbeat?
Then that means our suspect is...
Kushi.
Kujo.
Zale.
Kushi.
Whoa whoa whoa, hold it right there! Are you crazy? Of course it wasn't me!
If you say so. That leaves us with one likely suspect.
"If you say so"? I resent that!
Kujo.
Really?
She's hardly cocky, and anything but a deadbeat. She's a lot more together than you give her credit for.
Hmm...
That leaves us with one likely suspect.
Zale.
Zale? I guess that description does match, but...I find it hard to believe.
Still, he's the only one who fits the bill.
He said he was assigned to Lake Lud. Let's go find him and hear what he has to say.
Hello.
Kagachi? What're you doing here?
You know something about the Butcher, don't you.
The Butcher, huh?
Yeah, I know 'bout him.
Cause it's MEEE!
Figured.
GRAH! Dammit dammit dammit!
Damn you for interfering!
Zale... Why?
What's so bad about killing MORONS who wanna die anyway!?
We live in a society with rules. Laws. You can't ignore them and take matters into your own hands.
I'M THE ONLY ONE WHO CAN!
I'm gonna be HIM! The Night Devil, reborn!
You're mad.
I'll be just like him! A LEGEND! NO hesitation. NO doubt!
I want to show my LOVE for this land!
Silence, psychopath.
The Night Devil was just another killer, a fool who doomed himself by his own evil deeds.
And you, you're not like him. You weren't, at least.
What happened to you?
You got it ALL WRONG!
The Night Devil was DIFFERENT! His murders were PURE! NOBLE!
There's nothing noble about murder. He was just a killer. Just like you.
Shut UP! I HEARD him! The Night Devil spoke to ME! He did! HE DID HE DID HE DID!
Tell it to the judge.
We need no judge here.
Lord Leo!
The Night Devil? Feh.
Our land will never again suffer the chaos that fiend wrought. Take him to the dungeons.
Hold on, hold on. What happened to trials?
Unnecessary. The fate of those who utter that accursed name is sealed.
You can't just—
Mayura!
If you speak against me, you speak against the sovereign. The act of a traitor.
Be more wary of your tongue in the future.
Hey—
It's okay! I'm okay!
Some cling desperately to reincarnation, others exploit it. Still others glorify it.
There's no denying it. The realm is in the midst of a crisis.
Where have you been?
With the Lost. The girl who was crying.
Ah, yes. I'll have to send her off.
She's already gone.
What? How?
I prayed for her.
When I did, she told me something.
She said my prayers warmed her heart, and she didn't need the charm anymore.
Are you claiming your prayers gave her peace?
Maybe. Who knows. But it'd be nice if they did.
Ridiculous. Prayers couldn't— She must've been confused about the nature of her regrets.
Still...
Whatever the truth was, I couldn't see it, and you could.
So I'll say it. Thank you. You helped me clean up this mess faster than I could alone.
Did...you just thank me? For real?
Hehe.
Bah.
